categories: Category:Missions of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Raid on the Black Sun's clinic

In around 3643 BBY, Coruscant Security Force officer Stansun tasked an agent of the Galactic Republic with raiding a clinic being operated by the criminal Black Sun on the planet Coruscant. The clinic was being used to surgical alter the faces of wanted criminals to help them escape arrest, and Stansun wanted for it to be shut down and for a list of its previous patients so they could be tracked down.

The agent successfully located a passkey for the clinic and then entered the structure, killing at least eight of the Human and droid medical personnel working inside and shutting the facility down. The agent then recovered the patient list from the structure's computers and returned it to Stansun.
